description.value:
Frequency once per 10 minutes or until recharged (see text)

People in life-or-death situations can summon up impossible strength. With your mastery of such subjects, you can induce this strength when needed. You can attempt to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.PMbdMWc2QroouFGD], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.lOE4yjUnETTdaf2T]{Reposition}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.7blmbDrQFNfdT731]{Shove}, or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.ge56Lu1xXVFYUnLP]{Trip} a creature using a spell attack roll instead of an Athletics check. You can recharge Desperate Surge by making an unarmed Strike against a thrall in reach to absorb its strength, which automatically hits, destroys the thrall, and recharges the ability.
